name: Mathematics
description: Mathematics is the music of reason. Mathematics knows no races or geographic boundaries;

name: Programming
description: A language that doesn't affect the way you think about programming is not worth knowing

name: Astronomy
description: Man must rise above the Earth—to the top of the atmosphere and beyond—for only thus will he fully understand the world in which he lives

name: Physics
description: Not only is the Universe stranger than we think, it is stranger than we can think.

name: Chemistry
description: Chemistry is good when you make love with it. Chemistry is bad when you make crack with it. Frederick Soddy

name: Biology
description: Biology is the most powerful technology ever created. DNA is software, protein are hardware, cells are factories.
